responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "59D3D65A4E914206D3012BAD99FA0039", "We are not just fighting a rebellion of constructs, friend. We are facing a form of industrialized necromancy, a perversion of life and craft on a scale I can barely comprehend. I must study our findings. We need to reveal who, or what!, is capable of such magic and how to break such unholy bonds. In the mean time, deliver this report to Commander Thraen Dunzchasm here in Hammer Rest. He\'ll know what to do next.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_RunescribeFlinthelm_13_Response
